Package org.nmdp.ngs.tools

Next generation sequencing (NGS/HTS) command line tools.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DownsampleFastq
    Downsample sequences from files in FASTQ format.
    DownsampleInterleavedFastq
    Downsample sequences from a file in interleaved FASTQ format.
    EvaluateScaffolds
    Evaluate assembly scaffolds against a reference sequence.
    ExtractConsensus
    Extract consensus sequences from a file in HML format.
    ExtractExpectedGlstrings
    Extract expected allele assignments in GL String format from a file in HML format.
    ExtractExpectedHaploids
    Extract expected allele assignments in haploid elements from a file in HML format.
    FastaToFastq
    Convert sequences in FASTA format to FASTQ format.
    FastqDescription
    Output description lines from sequences in FASTQ format.
    FastqToFasta
    Convert sequences in FASTQ format to FASTA format.
    FastqToSsake
    Convert sequences in FASTQ format to SSAKE import format.
    FilterConsensus
    Filter consensus sequences into subregions of research or clinical interest.
    FilterInterpretableExons
    Filter interpretable exons from assembly consensus sequences.
    FilterSamples
    Filter samples from a file in HML format.
    FilterVcf
    Filter variants in VCF format.
    GenerateBed
    Generate records in BED format.
    GeneratePairedEndReads
    Generate paired-end next generation sequencing (NGS/HTS) reads.
    GenerateReads
    Generate next generation sequencing (NGS/HTS) reads.
    HspToBed
    Convert HSPs to BED format.
    InterleaveFastq
    Convert first and second sequence files in FASTQ format to interleaved FASTQ format.
    IntersectBed
    Similar to bedtools2 intersect -v.
    LiftoverBed
    Liftover BED file.
    MaskedToBed
    Convert hard-masked regions in a FASTA file to BED format.
    MergeFastq
    Merge two or more files in FASTQ format.
    SplitFasta
    Split sequences in FASTA format and write to separate files in FASTA format.
    ValidateHml
    Validate the syntax of a file in HML format.
    ValidateInterleavedFastq
    Validate a file in interleaved FASTQ format.
    ValidateInterpretation
    Validate interpretation.

Package org.nmdp.ngs.tools Description

Next generation sequencing (NGS/HTS) command line tools.
